name: Abbas Yusufzai
story: Jabr was raised in a small village in Iran where he learned the skills of a Combat Life Saver from his father who was a medic. After finishing his training, Jabr joined the Iranian military and was quickly recruited by the OPFOR forces in their fight against the NATO-led coalition. Jabr is a brave and compassionate soldier, always putting the needs of his fellow soldiers before his own. He hopes to one day return to his village and use his skills to help those in need.
